mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no,q.mem_no,q.qna_ctgr, q.od_no,q.qna_title, q.qna_date,q.qna_state, m.mem_name FROM qna q INNER JOIN member m ON q.mem_no = m.mem_no INNER JOIN orders o on o.od_no=q.od_no WHERE m.mem_no = #{mem_no} order by q.qna_no desc
SELECT qr.qr_no, q.qna_no, qr.qr_title, qr.qr_content,qr.qr_date FROM qna_reply qr INNER JOIN qna q ON qr.qna_no = q.qna_no where q.qna_no = #{qna_no}
SELECT q.qna_no, q.od_no, q.qna_title, q.qna_content,q.qna_date, q.qna_ctgr, q.qna_state, m.mem_name FROM qna q INNER JOIN member m ON q.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no}
